title: Reservation Confirmed
content: Your vehicle reservation for Toyota Camry has been confirmed.

title: Payment Successful
content: Your payment of $250 for the vehicle rental has been processed successfully.

title: Vehicle Returned
content: The vehicle BMW X5 has been successfully returned. Thank you!

title: New Promotion Available
content: Enjoy a 10% discount on all vehicle rentals this holiday season.

title: Late Return Notice
content: The vehicle Mercedes-Benz Metris is overdue. Please return it immediately.

title: Upcoming Reservation Reminder
content: Your reservation for Ford F-150 is scheduled for tomorrow at 9 AM.

title: Profile Updated
content: Your profile information has been successfully updated.

title: Damage Fee Charged
content: A fee of $100 has been charged for damages to the rented vehicle.

title: New Vehicle Added
content: A new vehicle, Audi Q5, is now available for rental.

title: Reservation Cancelled
content: Your reservation for Harley-Davidson Sportster has been cancelled.

title: Insurance Updated
content: Your insurance policy has been successfully updated for your rental.

title: Overdue Payment
content: Your payment for the vehicle rental is overdue. Please settle it immediately.

title: Feedback Requested
content: Please share your feedback on your recent vehicle rental experience.

title: System Maintenance
content: Our system will undergo maintenance tonight from 12 AM to 3 AM.

title: License Expiry Reminder
content: Your driver’s license on file is about to expire. Please update it.

title: New Reward Points
content: You’ve earned 150 reward points from your last rental.

title: Vehicle Maintenance Scheduled
content: The vehicle Tesla Model 3 is scheduled for maintenance tomorrow.

title: Loyalty Tier Upgraded
content: Congratulations! You’ve been upgraded to Gold Tier in our loyalty program.

title: Cancellation Fee Charged
content: A $50 cancellation fee has been applied for your reservation.

title: Special Offer Just for You
content: Book now and get a free day with every 3-day rental!
